description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的皇后，以贤惠、仁慈、节俭著称。她常劝谏朱元璋，挽救大臣性命，不干预朝政，限制外戚，深受后人敬仰。
description.en: The empress consort of the Hongwu Emperor of the Ming dynasty. She was renowned for her kindness, wisdom, and frugality, often advising the emperor and saving the lives of officials, and was highly respected by later generations.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的开国皇帝，孝慈高皇后马氏的丈夫。他曾将马皇后比作唐太宗时的长孙皇后，并在其去世后誓言不再立后。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming dynasty and the husband of Empress Ma. He compared Empress Ma to Empress Zhangsun of the Tang dynasty and vowed not to install another empress after her death.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军领袖之一，马皇后的养父，朱元璋早期的上司。
description.en: A leader of the Red Turban Rebellion during the late Yuan dynasty, the adoptive father of Empress Ma, and Zhu Yuanzhang's early superior.

description.zh-cn: 明朝孝慈高皇后马氏的父亲，后被朱元璋追封为徐王。
description.en: The father of Empress Ma of the Ming dynasty, posthumously created Prince of Xu by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝孝慈高皇后马氏的母亲，后被朱元璋追封为徐王夫人。
description.en: The mother of Empress Ma of the Ming dynasty, posthumously created Princess Consort of Xu by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋的嫡长子，洪武元年被立为皇太子。正史记载为马皇后所生，但亦有异说。
description.en: The eldest son of the Hongwu Emperor, designated as Crown Prince in the first year of the Hongwu era. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma, though conflicting accounts exist.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋次子，封秦愍王。正史记载为马皇后所生，但亦有异说。
description.en: The second son of the Hongwu Emperor, created Prince Min of Qin. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma, though conflicting accounts exist.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋三子，封晋恭王。正史记载为马皇后所生，但亦有异说。
description.en: The third son of the Hongwu Emperor, created Prince Gong of Jin. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma, though conflicting accounts exist.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋四子，明朝第三位皇帝。其生母存在争议，正史记载为马皇后，但有史料称其生母为䂵妃。
description.en: The fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor and the third emperor of the Ming dynasty. His parentage is disputed; while official histories record Empress Ma as his mother, some historical sources claim he was born to Consort Gong.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋五子，封周定王。正史记载为马皇后所生。
description.en: The fifth son of the Hongwu Emperor, created Prince Ding of Zhou. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋与马皇后所生的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of the Hongwu Emperor and Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋与马皇后所生的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of the Hongwu Emperor and Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明初文学家、官员，因孙子犯罪被牵连论死，后因马皇后求情得以赦免。
description.en: An early Ming scholar and official who was implicated in his grandson's crime and sentenced to death, but was later pardoned due to Empress Ma's intercession.

description.zh-cn: 明初吴兴富民，因主动出资犒劳军队而触怒朱元璋，后因马皇后劝谏而免于一死，改判流放云南。
description.en: A wealthy commoner from Wuxing in the early Ming dynasty who angered the Hongwu Emperor by offering to reward the imperial army. He was saved from execution by Empress Ma's counsel and was instead exiled to Yunnan.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，朱元璋之孙。于洪武三十一年追尊祖母马皇后。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming dynasty and grandson of the Hongwu Emperor. He honored his grandmother Empress Ma with a posthumous title in the 31st year of the Hongwu era (1398).

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一位皇帝，于嘉靖十七年再次为马皇后追上尊谥。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Ming dynasty. In the 17th year of the Jiajing era (1538), he further extended Empress Ma's posthumous title.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的妃子，部分史料记载其为明成祖朱棣的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Hongwu Emperor. Some historical sources identify her as the birth mother of the Yongle Emperor, Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的妃子，有史料记载其为懿文太子朱标、秦愍王朱樉、晋恭王朱㭎的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Hongwu Emperor. Some historical sources identify her as the birth mother of Crown Prince Yiwen (Zhu Biao), Prince Min of Qin (Zhu Shuang), and Prince Gong of Jin (Zhu Gang).

description.zh-cn: 明朝参军，其子被诬告欲杀父，朱元璋欲诛之，因马皇后劝谏而查明真相，使其免罪。
description.en: A military adjutant in the Ming dynasty. When his son was falsely accused of patricide, the Hongwu Emperor intended to execute him, but Empress Ma's counsel led to an investigation that cleared his name.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，镇守严州时被人诬告，朱元璋欲将其召回，因马皇后劝谏而作罢。
description.en: A Ming dynasty general who was falsely accused while defending Yanzhou. The Hongwu Emperor intended to recall him, but desisted after Empress Ma's advice.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。马皇后是其首位皇后。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history founded by Zhu Yuanzhang. Empress Ma was its first empress.

description.zh-cn: 皇帝正配的封号。马氏于洪武元年被册封为皇后。
description.en: The title for the primary consort of an emperor. Lady Ma was created Empress in the first year of the Hongwu era.

description.zh-cn: 位于今中国安徽省，是马皇后的出生地。
description.en: Located in modern-day Anhui Province, China, it is the birthplace of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年的首都，即今南京。是马皇后的逝世地点。
description.en: The capital of the early Ming dynasty, now modern Nanjing. It is the place where Empress Ma died.

description.zh-cn: 马氏是明太祖朱元璋的结发妻子和皇后。
description.en: Lady Ma was the primary wife and empress consort of the Hongwu Emperor, Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 马公是马皇后的父亲。
description.en: Ma Gong was the father of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 郑媪是马皇后的母亲。
description.en: Lady Zheng was the mother of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 马氏被其父马公托付给郭子兴抚养，认郭子兴为义父。
description.en: Empress Ma was entrusted to the care of Guo Zixing by her father, Ma Gong, and she regarded Guo Zixing as her adoptive father.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋早期投奔郭子兴帐下，为其部属。
description.en: In his early years, Zhu Yuanzhang joined Guo Zixing's forces and served as his subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 洪武元年正月初四，朱元璋登基当日册封马氏为皇后。
description.en: On January 23, 1368, the day he ascended the throne, the Hongwu Emperor created Lady Ma as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载，朱标为马皇后长子。
description.en: According to official histories, Zhu Biao was the eldest son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载，朱樉为马皇后次子。
description.en: According to official histories, Zhu Shuang was the second son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载，朱㭎为马皇后三子。
description.en: According to official histories, Zhu Gang was the third son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载，明成祖朱棣为马皇后四子，但其生母存在争议。
description.en: According to official histories, the Yongle Emperor (Zhu Di) was the fourth son of Empress Ma, but his parentage is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载，朱橚为马皇后五子。
description.en: According to official histories, Zhu Su was the fifth son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 宁国公主为马皇后所生之女。
description.en: Princess Ningguo was the daughter of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 安庆公主为马皇后所生之女。
description.en: Princess Anqing was the daughter of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂因孙子犯罪被论死，马皇后为他求情，最终使朱元璋赦免了他。
description.en: When Song Lian was sentenced to death due to his grandson's crime, Empress Ma interceded on his behalf, ultimately persuading the Hongwu Emperor to pardon him.

description.zh-cn: 沈秀因犒劳军队触怒朱元璋，马皇后劝谏说服朱元璋将其释放，免其死罪。
description.en: When Shen Xiu angered the Hongwu Emperor by rewarding the army, Empress Ma's counsel persuaded the emperor to release him, sparing him from the death penalty.

description.zh-cn: 马皇后认为对郭景祥之子的指控可能不实，劝谏朱元璋查证，最终证实其子被冤枉，使其免于处罚。
description.en: Believing the accusation against Guo Jingxiang's son might be false, Empress Ma advised the Hongwu Emperor to investigate, which ultimately proved the son's innocence and saved him from punishment.

description.zh-cn: 马皇后认为不应轻信对李文忠的诬告且轻易换将不妥，劝说朱元璋打消了召还李文忠的念头。
description.en: Empress Ma advised the Hongwu Emperor against rashly replacing Li Wenzhong based on unsubstantiated accusations, persuading the emperor to cancel his recall.

description.zh-cn: 洪武三十一年六月，建文帝朱允炆追尊祖母马皇后，为其上谥号“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: In June 1398, the Jianwen Emperor honored his grandmother, Empress Ma, with the posthumous title 'Xiaoci Zhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao Empress'.

description.zh-cn: 永乐十九年正月，明成祖朱棣重尊其为“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: In January 1421, the Yongle Emperor re-honored her with the title 'Xiaoci Zhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao Empress'.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖十七年，明世宗朱厚熜再次追尊马皇后，为其加上尊谥“孝慈贞化哲顺仁徽成天育圣至德高皇后”。
description.en: In 1538, the Jiajing Emperor further extended Empress Ma's posthumous title to 'Xiaoci Zhenhua Zheshun Renhui Chengtian Yusheng Zhide Gao Empress'.

description.zh-cn: 部分史料如《南京太常寺志》记载，明成祖朱棣为䂵妃所生。
description.en: Some historical sources, such as the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', state that the Yongle Emperor (Zhu Di) was born to Consort Gong.

description.zh-cn: 部分史料如《南京太常寺志》记载，朱标为李淑妃所生。
description.en: Some historical sources, such as the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', state that Zhu Biao was born to Consort Li.

description.zh-cn: 部分史料如《南京太常寺志》记载，朱樉为李淑妃所生。
description.en: Some historical sources, such as the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', state that Zhu Shuang was born to Consort Li.

description.zh-cn: 部分史料如《南京太常寺志》记载，朱㭎为李淑妃所生。
description.en: Some historical sources, such as the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', state that Zhu Gang was born to Consort Li.
